description: This file defines classes related to the move results in a 2048 game implementation, including representations for move steps, merge steps, spawn info, and the overall move result, mainly used for game logic and animations.

classes.name: MoveStep
classes.description: Represents a single tile movement from one position to another in the game grid.

classes.name: MergeStep
classes.description: Represents the merging of two tiles into a new tile at a specific position.

classes.name: SpawnInfo
classes.description: Contains information about a newly spawned tile in the game grid.

classes.name: MoveResult
classes.description: Aggregates all actions, changes, and outcomes resulting from a move in the game.

methods.name: MoveResult.empty
methods.description: Creates an empty move result instance, indicating no changes occurred during the move.
